title: Databrary NSF 2444730
text:
About






Figure 1.1: Graphic summary of the main aims of the project and their relationship to the phases of scientific research.



This site provides supporting documentation a project funded by the U.S. National Science Foundation “Collaborative Research: HNDS-I: Enhancing Infrastructure For Discovery About Human Behavior”, NSF 2444730. The project period is March 1, 2025 to February 28, 2027.
We are grateful to taxpayers for their support of scientific research.

title: Submitted proposal
text:
Karen Adolph and Rick Gilmore submitted a proposal to the NSF Human Networks and Data Science Infrastructure (HNDS-I) program on August 1, 2024.
The proposal narrative, minus sensitive or detailed financial information is here.
